overview:
Annie Infinite (Robinson) is a successful social media and SEO consultant and trainer whose clientele includes both international and Australian businesses with wide and varying interests from green businesses, jewellery, directories and social sites.

Along with her business partner who is a website designer extraordinaire in their business, The Zen Bull she also holds regular workshops and bootcamps teaching any business or website owner the power of using authentic Social Media Marketing strategies and quality SEO techniques. Her mission is to prove that good website marketing is not a mystery; it is a system and has steps that can be taught to anyone.

The Zen Bull is a full service web company providing hosting, marketing consultancy and arguably the best CMS software on the web to aspiring website owners looking for quality.
